text: How the First Female Pilot to Die on Active Duty with the US Military Cultivated Her Love of Flying Cornelia Fort was less than a year into her job as a flight instructor in Hawaii when she and her student pilot narrowly avoided a midair collision, … [Gregg S](/@gscircle) flipped this story into [War Stories ](/@gscircle/war-stories-o1omcbirz)•1d Related articles More stories from [Military](/topic/military) [Dean Phillips defends Gold Star dad Steve Nikoui after heckling Biden at SOTU address](/topic/military/dean-phillips-defends-gold-star-dad-steve-nikoui-after-heckling-biden-at-sotu-ad/a-lXOfHgWoQMeHyMP_XowfLQ%3Aa%3A47769551-a3cf740db8%2Ffoxnews.com) Former Democratic Presidential candidate Rep. Dean Phillips, D-Minn., came to the defense of the father of a Marine who was arrested after Thursday's State of the Union during which he shouted at President Joe Biden.
